Introduction

Dazzling RED is a one-time unit created for the annual end of the year music and award TV show 2012 SBS Gayo Daejun. Dazzling RED consists of 5 members: Hyosung, Hyolyn, Nana, Nicole and HyunA.

Current state:
disbanded

Dec 27, 2012
